summary: I OWN 1998 F150 TRUCK THAT HAS DEVELOPED A CRACK IN THE DOOR NEAR THE WINDOW  MOLDING.  I HAVE BEEN TOLD THIS IS A DESIGN PROBLEM, BUT  FORD WILL NOT  FIX IT UNLESS MY WARRANTY 3/36 IS APPLICABLE.  I HAVE AN EXTENDED WARRANTY BUT  IT IS NO GOOD.  THIS CRACK HAD LIKELY FORMED BEFORE MY WARRANTY EXPIRED. I FEEL IT QUESTIONS THE DESIGN AND STRENGTH OF THE DOOR AND HOW SAFE IT WILL BE WITH CRACKS DEVELOPING WEAKENING IT.*JB
